At the beginning of a monumental movement, Rosa Parks bravely refused to give up her seat on a bus.

I ask all of you to put yourselves in the shoes of the parents who have had to bury their babies.

Do you have the courage to do what is right to save our children? And if not, do you really—truly—have the courage to look away? https://t.co/IfIrmxmxia

1466062208761307136.text: I will speak on the House Floor momentarily about the tragic shooting in Michigan yesterday. Tune in here: https://t.co/NRrmmGFqG9.

1465820539805741061.text:
We need to stand up to save American lives. We must have the courage—right now—to do what is right for the American people.

It is time for us to act. It is long past time.

1465820538367090688.text:
I hear from families across America who do not have the confidence that we, Congress, will do what is needed to keep them safe.

They ask me, "what are we waiting for? What are we doing to protect our children?"

1465820536601202690.text: Parents begging their children "to barricade yourselves behind doors, to hide in classrooms, and to please, hold your tears, you cannot make a sound."

1465820535225475078.text: Our young people texting their parents from behind a desk saying things like, "Mom, if I don’t make it, I love you, and I appreciate everything you’ve done for me."

1465820533484883970.text:
Enough is enough. Enough gun violence in our schools. Enough children hiding in fear. Enough parents with pits in their stomach when they can’t reach their kids.

1349450404648673281.text: It is our duty to shoulder that defense of democracy today. The President's actions have laid bare his contempt for our Constitution, and he must be removed.

1349450206031601665.text: In every generation, Americans of all colors & creeds have laid down their lives in the struggle against tyranny, the fight against fascism, and the defense against those who would betray the values upon which this nation was founded. https://t.co/5LFkYmkxMi

1349199969908092929.text: Our response to anyone who seeks to overthrow the will of the people must be unwavering and resolute. I didn’t come to Congress to do this, but President Trump’s actions warrant his immediate removal from office. https://t.co/DpBlTQlMHg

1348649217221423104.text: With heavy hearts and a clear purpose, we have again been called to protect our Constitution and defend our democracy. With the eyes of the world and the presence of God upon us, we must do our solemn duty.

1348649216235724803.text: If the 25th is not invoked, Congress must impeach the President, remove him from office, and disqualify him from ever again holding an office of trust under the United States of America.

1348649215371653122.text: Last week, I called for Vice President Pence to invoke the 25th Amendment and remove President Trump from office.

1348649214390239232.text: The result of his rhetoric has left five Americans dead, laying bare his contempt for our Constitution, his disdain for our democracy, and his persistent threat to this nation’s security.

1348649213366829059.text: The world watched as insurrectionists, incited by President Trump, attacked American democracy, American institutions, and the American way of life.

1347672700731465728.text:

1347312135299334146.text:
Early this morning, Congress fulfilled its constitutional duty to certify the results of the 2020 election. Although Georgia's electors were ultimately not objected to, I want to share my prepared remarks with you this evening.

https://t.co/GjYKy1Dv8Y

1346973451882360834.text:
The eyes of the world are upon us, and the President's incitement of violence, his inducement of chaos, and his inability to faithfully "discharge the powers and duties of his office" make it clear.

The President has refused to protect our democracy and must be removed.

1346973451093991425.text: Tonight, I am asking Vice President Pence to invoke the 25th Amendment and begin the process of removing President Trump from office.

1346934039509397507.text:
And I have faith that the world's oldest democracy, the nation home to the American people, the nation that will forever stand for freedom, justice, and liberty, will remain triumphant.

God bless us all.

1346934038490013696.text:
Today, I pray for the safety of my colleagues, of staff, and of our law enforcement.

I pray for the values this nation was founded upon, and for the ideals that must endure long after we are gone.

1346934037533880320.text: My staff and I are safe. The actions of those seeking to overturn the will of the people are dangerous and destructive, but they will not succeed.

1346224931579846659.text: While we have come a long way, there is still so much more to be done. I look forward to continuing to fight for our friends and neighbors, our communities, and our country.

1346224928983547904.text:
As we begin the 117th Congress, I reflect on how far we’ve come and all we have accomplished together.

Truly, it is an honor to serve you, my constituents, and your families. https://t.co/tGB5YwytN3

1343708312475377664.text:
The NDAA is a bipartisan bill that provides our brave men & women in uniform a pay raise, supports our national defense efforts, and continues to move America toward a safer & more secure future.

I remain committed to supporting those who defend this nation & our values.

1343695389816479750.text:
For almost a year, the American people have been battling this deadly pandemic, and it is long past time that hard-working families across our nation receive necessary support.

I support this bill because now is not the time to back down - the American people deserve relief.

1342485256742572035.text: I am wishing each and every one of you a safe, healthy, and Merry Christmas! During the holiday season, remember to share God's love with one another.

1341863004657180672.text: I look forward to continuing our work to provide necessary aid to the American people.

1341863003461849089.text:

1224799213084717056.text: “A reasonable plan to control drug prices #ForThePeople is sitting on Mitch McConnell’s desk. If Republicans wanted to do something to help the American people, they would bring it to the floor.” -Dr. Jamie Weisman #StateofHealthCare

1224799212325482498.text: “We are in a health care crisis of our own making. These medications are the difference between life and death. And, as in my father’s case, the price tag is almost unbearable.” #StateOfHealthCare

1224799211524280320.text: “Medicare Part D explicitly prohibits Medicare from negotiating drug prices with pharmaceutical companies. As a result, Americans pay far higher prices for medications than any other country.” #StateOfHealthCare

1224799210295480323.text: “The costs of these drugs are so high that people, like my father, become part of a system that cares more about profit than patients. As he struggled for his life, he worried what he would be able to leave for my mother." #StateOfHealthCare

1224799209204875266.text: “I’m attending the #SOTU with Rep. McBath. As a doctor and a patient, I know that in three years we’ve made zero progress on controlling runaway drug prices and the suffering of patients goes unchecked.” #StateOfHealthCare
